abstract: The billionaire investor is leaving his long-held position, but Berkshire Hathaway showed no signs of selling its stake.
snippet: The billionaire investor is leaving his long-held position, but Berkshire Hathaway showed no signs of selling its stake.
lead_paragraph: 2:56 p.m. | Updated Warren Buffett, the investor whose guidance is considered gospel by many on Wall Street, is leaving his long-held position on the board of the Washington Post Company.

headline.main: Warren Buffett to Leave Washington Post Co. Board

abstract: The chairman of Berkshire Hathaway, still the largest shareholder of the newspaper and education company, said he would remain close to the company as an informal adviser.
snippet: The chairman of Berkshire Hathaway, still the largest shareholder of the newspaper and education company, said he would remain close to the company as an informal adviser.
lead_paragraph: Lucas Jackson/ReutersWarren E. Buffet, chairman of Berkshire Hathaway.

headline.main: Buffett to Step Down From Washington Post Board
